channel.title: Error Help Please
channel.description:
[center][b]Hey Everyone, Im In The Middle Of A Project but Before We Carry On With It We Having This Problem Everytime We Run The Client Please Help Us Fix This We Will Pay If Jobs Done Perfect Or In-Game Admin Your Choose.
Thanks From Basic
P.S. We Dont Get The Following. Lag When Loggin In, People Can Connect To Server, Dont Kick You Off Server The Reason I Put This As That All Iv Seen To Do With This Error
[img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/5133/helpvv.jpg[/img][/b][/center]
